briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Intravenous Ibuprofen for Treatment of Pain in Pediatric Patients Undergoing Tonsillectomy
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single Dose Trial of the Safety and Efficacy of Intravenous Ibuprofen for Treatment of Pain in Pediatric Patients Undergoing Tonsillectomy
summary: The hypothesis is that a single, pre-operative dose of intravenous ibuprofen will significantly reduce post-operative fentanyl use compared to placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Doses of Fentanyl Administered in the Postoperative Period Prior to Discharge.
